title: Freemixing in Masjids on Eid? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: Carlos from Brazil so in many mid in my country during men and woman men and women stay in the same place for lunch breakfast so this free mixing is pris allowed what do you mean by free mixing they sit together and mix and speak and see one another on the same table now no this is not permissible at all such free mixing is Haram in normal cases let alone on or in the Masjid itself and it is the part of the responsibility of those in authority to govern this and to segregate between men and women as did the prophet at his times so this is totally prohibited and not permissible
